sentences.english: Special meal should be booked 24 hours before departure.
sentences.chinese: 特殊餐食应在飞机起飞前24小时定妥。

sentences.english: When mixed with water, the powder would provide sustainable meals .
sentences.chinese: 加水调和后，这种狗食粉将可提供丰富的餐食。

sentences.english: The crabs were steamed and then ground into meal for the fields.
sentences.chinese: 鲎被蒸熟后作为土地的餐食撒入土地。

sentences.english: Are there any special requirement for school meals?
sentences.chinese: 申请人对学校餐食是否有特殊需求？

sentences.english: You'll also find facilities for changing your baby's nappies.
sentences.chinese: 您可以跟我到厨房，为您的孩子挑选餐食。

sentences.english: When you go to a fast-food restaurant, you expect to get your fries quickly.
sentences.chinese: 走进快餐店，你希望快速得到所点餐食。

sentences.english: Kimchi is the soul of the meals, South Korea.
sentences.chinese: 泡菜，是韩国餐食的灵魂。

sentences.english: It was very generous of them to share their meal with their out-of-work neighbors.
sentences.chinese: 他们愿意让失业的邻人共享餐食，真的十分慷慨。

sentences.english: Yes, the meal was very delicious and I enjoyed very much. I'm full.
sentences.chinese: 是的，餐食味道很好，我非常喜欢，我吃饱了。

sentences.english: In this, of course, you will recognise the dimension of the totemic meal.
sentences.chinese: 当然，在这一点，你们会认出图腾餐食的向度。

sentences.english: What kind of food do they serve here?
sentences.chinese: 他们供应什么风味的餐食？

sentences.english: Dill, parsley and water celery as part of the meal is to use fork edible.
sentences.chinese: 莳萝，欧芹和水芹作为餐食的一部分是要用叉食用的。

sentences.english: In the United States, McDonald's has backed off supersizing too.
sentences.chinese: 在美国，麦当劳也在撤销超大尺寸餐食。

definition: attendant on an airplane, train, boat etc
(at a restaurant) to order a meal/(of a waiter) to take an order
